data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of the genus Chlamisus Rafinesque (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae) from China with description of three new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Su, Liang, Zhou, Hong-Zhang (2017): Taxonomy of the genus Chlamisus Rafinesque (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae) from China with description of three new species. Zootaxa 4233 (1): 1-138, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.322116
